Description:
I had Nexus 2.3.0-04 with nexus-p2-repository 2.3 installed and working.
I upgrading nexus-p2-repository to 2.3.1 and Nexus restarted ok but when a P2 artifact is retrieved, I get a 500 error. It seems to be caused by a method not found: see the capture as there is no error in the nexus log.
